remediations.subject: Dividend reconciliation: ISIN KR7005930003
remediations.body: Please review and correct the custody amount reported for the dividend event on 31.03.2025. The current custody amount of 7,220,000 exceeds the NBIM reported amount of 6,769,950 by 450,050. Confirm the accurate custody amount and update your records accordingly to ensure data consistency.

remediations.subject: Dividend reconciliation: ISIN KR7005930003
remediations.body: Please verify and update the custody tax amount reported for the dividend event on 31.03.2025. The custodian reported a custody tax of 1,805,000 at 20%, whereas NBIM's data indicates 1,985,500 at 22%. Confirm the correct withholding tax rate and adjust your records to reflect the accurate amount.

remediations.subject: Dividend reconciliation: ISIN KR7005930003
remediations.body: The pay date discrepancy for the dividend event on 31.03.2025, with custodian showing 25.05.2025 and market data indicating around 20.05.2025, requires clarification. Please confirm the official dividend payment date from your records or external sources to resolve this timing variance.

remediations.subject: Dividend reconciliation: ISIN CH0038863350

The current custody nominal value of 30,000 differs from NBIM's 15,000, indicating a potential internal data entry error. Confirm the accurate nominal amount and update your records accordingly.

remediations.subject: Dividend reconciliation: ISIN CH0038863350
remediations.body: Please verify and correct the gross amount reported for the dividend event on 25.04.2025. The custodian reports 37,200, while NBIM's data indicates 31,000, suggesting a calculation discrepancy. Confirm the correct gross amount and update your records to ensure accurate reporting.

remediations.subject: Dividend reconciliation: ISIN CH0038863350
remediations.body: The discrepancy in net amount for the dividend event on 25.04.2025, with custodian reporting 24,180 and NBIM reporting 20,150, requires clarification. Please confirm the correct net amount and provide supporting documentation or explanation for the variance.

remediations.subject: Dividend reconciliation: ISIN CH0038863350
remediations.body: The reported tax amount of 13,020 at a 35% rate aligns with Swiss withholding standards. Please confirm the withholding tax details and clarify if any adjustments are necessary based on your records or official documentation.
